variables.input:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`
| fields tags
| summarize tags = collectDistinct(tags)

4.title: Devices interfaces discards and errors
4.query:
timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.discards`),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.discards`),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.errors`),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.errors`),
by: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, type, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)
| fieldsAdd sum_trouble = avg_indiscards + avg_outdiscards + avg_inerrors + avg_outerrors
| fieldsRemove  type, timeframe, t_indiscards, t_outdiscards,t_inerrors, t_outerrors,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`, interval,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=description
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors,sum_trouble
| append [timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.drops.in.count`),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.drops.out.count`),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.errors.in.count`),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.errors.out.count`),
by: `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.f5:interface` | fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField: `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)
| fieldsAdd sum_trouble = avg_indiscards + avg_outdiscards + avg_inerrors + avg_outerrors
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, t_indiscards, t_outdiscards,t_inerrors, t_outerrors,`dt.entity.f5:interface`, interval,  `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = NodeName,Interface=Name
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors,sum_trouble]
| append [timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.discards.count`),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.discards.count`),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.err.count`),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.err.count`),
by: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface` | fields id, if_descr , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  if_descr, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]`}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField: `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`)/(interval/1s),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`)/(interval/1s),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`)/(interval/1s),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)/(interval/1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_trouble = avg_indiscards + avg_outdiscards + avg_inerrors + avg_outerrors
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, t_indiscards, t_outdiscards,t_inerrors, t_outerrors,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`, interval,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]`
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=if_descr
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors,sum_trouble]
| append [timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.discards.count`),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.discards.count`),
t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.err.count`), t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.err.count`),
by: `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface` | fields id, InterfaceDescription , runs_on[`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  InterfaceDescription, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]`}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`| fields id, SystemName],
    sourceField: `runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ SystemName }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`)/(interval/1s),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`)/(interval/1s),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`)/(interval/1s),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)/(interval/1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_trouble = avg_indiscards + avg_outdiscards + avg_inerrors + avg_outerrors
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, t_indiscards, t_outdiscards,t_inerrors, t_outerrors,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`, interval,  `runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]`
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = SystemName,Interface=InterfaceDescription
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors]
| sort sum_trouble desc
| fieldsRemove sum_trouble
| limit 10

8.title: Interfaces in Up/Down state
8.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd description,type,  opStatus, adminStatus
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`] ,
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id, entity.name
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_system_name,Interface=description
| filter `DNS name` !="AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" AND adminStatus == "up(1)"
| fieldsRemove opStatus, adminStatus
|append [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd Name, Status,EnabledState
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`],
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id, entity.name
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_NodeName,Interface=Name,opStatus=Status,adminStatus=EnabledState
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(1)" AND adminStatus == "true(1)"
| fieldsRemove opStatus, adminStatus]

10.title: NODE INTERFACES UP/DOWN
10.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd   opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" and adminStatus == "up(1)"
| summarize sum_int=count()
|append [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd   if_adminstatus,if_operstatus
| filter if_operstatus == "down(2)" and if_adminstatus == "down(2)"
| summarize sum_int=count()]
|append [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`
| fieldsAdd   InterfaceAdminStatus,IFOperatingStatus
| filter IFOperatingStatus == "down(2)" and InterfaceAdminStatus == "down(2)"
| summarize sum_int=count()]
|append [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd   EnabledState,Status
| filter Status == "down(1)" and EnabledState == "true(1)"
| summarize sum_int=count()]
| summarize sum_down=sum(sum_int)

11.title: INBOUND DISCARDS
11.query:
timeseries t_indiscards=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.discards`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outdiscards= arrayAvg(t_indiscards)
| fields sum_outdiscards
| append  [timeseries t_indiscards=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.discards.count`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outdiscards= arrayAvg(t_indiscards)
|  fields sum_outdiscards]
| append  [timeseries t_indiscards=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.discards.count`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outdiscards= arrayAvg(t_indiscards)
|  fields sum_outdiscards]
| summarize sum_indiscards=sum(sum_outdiscards)

16.title: Network devices open Problems
16.query:
fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField:affected_entity_id, fields: {problem,affected_entity_id,display_id},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0], status,event.id,  display_id, event.name
| summarize {problem = takeMax(record(display_id, event.name,event.status,event.id)) },by:{affected_entity_id,display_id}
| filter problem[`event.status`] == "ACTIVE"
| fieldsFlatten problem]
| filter isnotNull(problem) 
| fieldsadd `DNS Name` = NodeName
| fields  `DNS Name`,  problem[display_id],problem[`event.name`],problem[`event.id`]

|append [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField:affected_entity_id, fields: {problem,affected_entity_id,display_id},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0], status,event.id,  display_id, event.name
| summarize {problem = takeMax(record(display_id, event.name,event.status,event.id)) },by:{affected_entity_id,display_id}
| filter problem[`event.status`] == "ACTIVE"
| fieldsFlatten problem]
| filter isnotNull(problem) 
|fieldsadd `DNS Name` = SystemName
|fields  `DNS Name`,  problem[display_id], problem[`event.name`],problem[`event.id`]]

|append [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField:affected_entity_id, fields: {problem,affected_entity_id,display_id},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0], status,event.id,  display_id, event.name
| summarize {problem = takeMax(record(display_id, event.name,event.status,event.id)) },by:{affected_entity_id,display_id}
| filter problem[`event.status`] == "ACTIVE"
| fieldsFlatten problem]
| filter isnotNull(problem) 
|fieldsadd `DNS Name` = system_name
|fields  `DNS Name`,  problem[display_id], problem[`event.name`],problem[`event.id`]]

| append [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField:affected_entity_id, fields: {problem,affected_entity_id,display_id},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0], status,event.id,  display_id, event.name
| summarize {problem = takeMax(record(display_id, event.name,event.status,event.id)) },by:{affected_entity_id,display_id}
| filter problem[`event.status`] == "ACTIVE"
| fieldsFlatten problem]
| filter isnotNull(problem) 
| fieldsadd `DNS Name` = system_name
| fields  `DNS Name`,  problem[display_id], problem[`event.name`],problem[`event.id`]]

|fieldsrename  Description=`problem[event.name]`
|fieldsadd `Problem link`  = concat("https://guu84124.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.problems/#problems/problemdetails;gtf=-2h;gf=all;pid=", `problem[event.id]`)
|fieldsrename `Problem id`  = `problem[display_id]`
| fieldsRemove  `problem[event.id]`

17.title: TOTAL TRAFFIC
17.query:
timeseries t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`),t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`)
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic= tolong(arraySum(t_in)+ arraySum(t_out))
|  fields sum_traffic
| append  [timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.octets`), t_out=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.octets`),by:{`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`}
| filter `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`!= "CUSTOM_DEVICE-3ED25361DCBE9554"
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic= tolong(arraySum(t_in)+ arraySum(t_out))
|  fields sum_traffic]
| append  [timeseries  t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.bits`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.bits`)
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic= tolong(arraySum(t_in)+ arraySum(t_out))*8
|  fields sum_traffic]
| append  [timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`)
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic= tolong(arraySum(t_in)+ arraySum(t_out))
|  fields sum_traffic]
| summarize sum_traffic=sum(sum_traffic)

18.title: OUTBOUND DISCARDS
18.query:
timeseries t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.discards`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outdiscards= arrayAvg(t_outdiscards)
| fields sum_outdiscards
| append  [timeseries t_outdiscards=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.discards.count`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outdiscards= arrayAvg(t_outdiscards)
|  fields sum_outdiscards]
| append  [timeseries t_outdiscards=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.discards.count`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outdiscards= arrayAvg(t_outdiscards)
|  fields sum_outdiscards]
| summarize sum_outdiscards=sum(sum_outdiscards)

19.title: OUTBOUND ERRORS
19.query:
timeseries t_outerrors=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.errors`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outerrors= arrayAvg(t_outerrors)
| fields sum_outerrors
| append  [timeseries t_outerrors=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.err.count`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outerrors= arrayAvg(t_outerrors)
|  fields sum_outerrors]
| append  [timeseries t_outerrors=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.err.count`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outerrors= arrayAvg(t_outerrors)
|  fields sum_outerrors]
| summarize sum_errors=sum(sum_outerrors)

21.title: INBOUND ERRORS
21.query:
timeseries t_inerrors=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.errors`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outerrors= arrayAvg(t_inerrors)
| fields sum_outerrors
| append  [timeseries t_inerrors=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.err.count`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outerrors= arrayAvg(t_inerrors)
|  fields sum_outerrors]
| append  [timeseries t_inerrors=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.err.count`, rate:1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_outerrors= arrayAvg(t_inerrors)
|  fields sum_outerrors]
| summarize sum_errors=sum(sum_outerrors)

23.title: UNRESPONSIVE DEVICES
23.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| append `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`
| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
| summarize count()

25.title: MONITORED DEVICES
25.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| append `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`
| summarize count()

26.title: OPEN DEVICE PROBLEMS
26.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems) 
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )
|append[fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]
|append[fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]
|append[fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]
| summarize countdown=sum(result)

27.title: Top interface Inbound load

28.title: Top interfaces Outbound load
